items.summary: In the Home page “Our Team” section (frontend/src/components/FoundersSection.tsx), swap the displayed name labels so that the first card (the one currently using the Sumit photo configuration) displays “Saloni Singh” and the second card (the one currently using the Saloni photo configuration) displays “Sumit Shrivastav”. Change names only; do not change photos, roles, ordering, or any other content.
